title: OODS Telemetry Event
description: Schema for JSONL telemetry emitted by pipelines and agent actions.

source.description: Origin component emitting the event (pipeline, soak-runner, cli, etc.).

action.description: Lifecycle action represented by the event.

status.description: Current lifecycle status as of the event.

outcome.description: Outcome of the job when known.

durationMs.description: Execution duration in milliseconds when applicable.

correlationId.description: UUID tying together all log lines for this job execution.

incidentId.description: Populated with a UUID when a failure occurs.

errorCode.description: Exit or error code supplied by the failing job.

metadata.description: Additional structured data captured for the event.
